pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:6.2: At that time out-of-season robe-cloth was given to the Order of nuns,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:6.3: and the Order assembled to share it out.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:6.4: Just then the nuns who were pupils of the nun Thullanandā were away,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:6.5: and Thullanandā said this to the nuns:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:6.6: “Venerables, the nuns are away. The robe-cloth is not to be distributed until they get back.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:6.7: And she blocked the distribution of robe-cloth.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:6.8: Since the robe-cloth was not to be distributed until those nuns returned, the other nuns left.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:6.9: When those pupil nuns returned, Thullanandā distributed that robe-cloth.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:7.1: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:7.3: “How could Venerable Thullanandā block a legitimate distribution of robe-cloth?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:7.7: How can the nun Thullanandā block a legitimate distribution of robe-cloth?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:8.1: ‘If a nun blocks a legitimate distribution of robe-cloth, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:10.2: it is distributed by a complete Order of nuns.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:11.2: if she blocks it with the thought, “What can be done so that this robe-cloth isn’t distributed?”, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:12.1: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as legitimate, and she blocks it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:12.2: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure if it is, and she blocks it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:12.3: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as illegitimate, and she blocks it, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:12.4: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as legitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:12.5: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure if it is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:12.6: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as illegitimate, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:13.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:14.1: The seventh training rule is finished.
